entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
